pkgmetadata.longdescription: DFMs for Nowcasting // Run dynamic factor models (DFM) in R. Adapted from Bok et al. (2017) https://www.newyorkfed.org/media library/media/research/staff_reports/sr830.pdf. The package provides the ability to estimate a DFM model, obtain predictions from estimated models, and obtain the impact of new data releases on model predictions.
